snippet.title: My Friendly Neighborhood - Official Free Update Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Take a look at the trailer for My Friendly Neighborhood's free update. Something scary is happening with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show... Fend off puppets and solve puzzles in this survival horror adventure. My Friendly Neighborhood's free update launches on Steam tomorrow, October 20, 2023.
